name: ANIME HELL 1995
description:
ANIME HELL 1995 is a twine game about depression, self-hate, time travel, dopplegangers, being sucked into a fantasy world, and more, all within the context of the VHS tape hell of 1995. 5 stories total, with the fifth unlocked after you play through the initially available four.

pay what you want, download and play right in your browser!
